New Records: Glenn Maxwell scored the fastest century in World Cups (40 balls)
Aryan Dutt delivered the most expensive over in men's ODI history (0-47)
Key Match Events: Logan van Beek took 4 wickets for 74 runs
Netherlands were bowled out for 90 runs
Post-Match Reflections: Pat Cummins expressed happiness about the complete game
Scott Edwards acknowledged the challenges with the bat and the quality of Australia's bowling
Miscellaneous Highlights: Glenn Maxwell was named Player of the Match
David Warner equaled Sachin Tendulkar and passed Ricky Ponting with his sixth World Cup hundred
Others: The match was played at the Arun Jaitley Stadium in Delhi
